effect.en: You must discard a Pokémon that has the Mad Party attack from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 2 cards.
This attack does 20 damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile that has the Mad Party attack.

description.en: This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.
